glsa.title: Open vSwitch: Remote execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in Open vSwitch might allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Open vSwitch is a production quality multilayer virtual switch.

description.p: A buffer overflow was discovered in lib/flow.c in ovs-vswitchd.

impact.p: A remote attacker, using a specially crafted MPLS packet, could execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Open vSwitch users should upgrade to the latest version:
